messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yes, I live at 301 South 2nd Street.
Mm-hmm.
I've got a gentleman here that says there's been some gunshots fired outside.
Okay. Did you hear them yourself, or did you?
No, I didn't. The gentleman is right here. He wants to talk to you.
Okay, put him on.
Hello?
Okay, you heard gunshots?
Yeah, I was inside my house, and my sister-in-law's boyfriend came and started shooting everybody. I had to jump off the roof.
You saw the person doing this?
Yeah.
Okay, where at?
309 South 2nd Street.
What's the person's name that's shooting?
Roberto.
Is he still there with the gun?
I think so. He's at 309. I went onto the roof and jumped out.
He's upstairs shooting?
He started shooting my wife and all the kids. He started shooting.
At 309 South 2nd Street, he's shooting your wife and kids?
Yes, he's shooting my wife, and I don't know about the others.
Okay. So he's still at the house, right?
Yeah.
Okay, hold on for a moment.
